about_the_game:
Welcome to Xerme, an enigmatic world ready to be explored! Immerse yourself in a unique voyage of discovery and peek into the hidden secrets of an alien universe. Xerme invites you to a gaming experience where curiosity is your best guide and exploration is your means to discover the truth behind this mysterious world.

Embark on a journey through a white land, dotted with details that hold energy and meaning. As you progress, you will encounter beings and elements that defy the laws of nature and create a dazzling environment full of mysteries to be solved.

Discover unique mechanics where energy is the key to solving puzzles and unlocking new areas of the world. As you learn to manipulate this energy and collaborate with other players in asynchronous multiplayer, you will face intriguing challenges that will test your skills and creativity.

Xerme is not just a game, but an immersion into a fascinating narrative about evolution, collaboration and destiny. Unravel the connection between the layers of reality as you explore stunning landscapes and solve puzzles that reveal the story that drives this world to change and grow.

Prepare to immerse yourself in an immersive environment where every step brings you closer to unlocking the secrets of Xerme. Are you ready to explore the unknown and face challenges beyond the surface? Discover what lies hidden in the deep layers of Xerme and embark on a journey that will change your perception of what is possible.
